quotes.quote: Better a witty fool than a foolish wit.
Many a witty inspiration is like the surprising reunion of befriended thoughts after a long separation.
Witty inspirations are the proverbs of the educated.
A witty woman is a treasure; a witty beauty is a power.
To be witty is not enough. One must possess sufficient wit to avoid having too much of it.
Generally speaking, there is more wit than talent in the world. Society swarms with witty people who lack talent.
You can pretend to be serious; but you can't pretend to be witty.
Next to being witty, the best thing is being able to quote another's wit.
Wit is the appearance, the external flash of imagination. Thus its divinity, and the witty character of mysticism.
People who can't be witty exert themselves to be devout and affectionate.
One cannot be always laughing at a man without now and then stumbling on something witty.
Humor is an antidote to all ills.
Being funny, it turns out, is like being a bank. It's a confidence trick. As long as everyone believes in you, you are fine.
If you were half as funny as you think you are, you'd be twice as funny as you really are.
Every habit makes our hand more witty, and out wit more handy.
